name: 2nd International Alzheimer’s Disease & Dementia Conference
content: Magnus Group cordially invites you to join its preeminent event “International Alzheimer’s Disease & Dementia Conference” (Dementia 2023) which will be held in Rome, Italy during June 15-16, 2023\. The global conference will highlight the theme “Explicating Advancements to Combat the Silent Epidemic of Dementia and Alzheimer.” With fascinating new insights into molecular and cellular pathways, Alzheimer's and Dementia Disease Research is accelerating. This Upcoming Dementia Conference will bring together some of the field's top leaders with young investigators in order to spark debate and interaction. This Alzheimer’s Summit will provide a forum for congregating national and international experts along with researchers, scientists, neurologists, caregivers, people living with Alzheimer’s and dementia, and policymakers to establish a form for a conversation and define the path for future advancements. With a Global Dementia Network of persons from various backgrounds, the conference provides fresh, innovative, and diverse content. Its multidisciplinary approach gives participants a one-of-a-kind opportunity to hear other points of view and combine them with their own.
